articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: U.S. conducts strikes on ISIS targets in Syria in retaliation for killing of American soldiers - Axios
articles.description: Operation "Hawkeye Strike" is the most wide-ranging U.S. military operation against ISIS in Syria in several years.
articles.content:
• The U.S. operation also takes place amid a historic rapprochement between the Trump administration and the new Syria government.

articles.author: Jillian Berman
articles.title: They’re in their 60s and still paying off student loans. College debt in America now lasts a lifetime. - MarketWatch
articles.description: ‘I just keep hoping that it will just magically go away or I’ll just die’: A growing feature of the nation’s $1.7 trillion student-debt crisis is Americans living with student loans for their entire adult lives
articles.content: Tala Henry-Halabi has been repaying her student loans for some 40 years. She graduated from the University of South Florida in 1985 owing $9,924; now, at age 62, she owes more than she borrowed in th… [+247 chars]
